1. /userinfo [UserID] e.g /userinfo @mohamadhase  
 *get the information about given user*

2. /teams [TeamName] e.g /teams backend  
 * get the information about given team* 
 *if the team name not given will return all teams in the org*

3. /attendances [UserID] e.g /attendances @mohamadhase  
 *get is the given user is attended or not * 
  *if the UserID not given will return the list of all attended employees *

1. /addattend [NumberOfHours] 
 *add me as an attended in this day with the given number of hours*

3./getattend [Day/Month/Year]  
 *get the imformation about attendance in the given date *

4. /salary  
 *get the information about the salary in the current month *

5. /attendreport[Month] [Year]  
 *get full report about your attendance in the given month *
